description.en: Water Resources Management Agency responsible for water infrastructure and allocation from Lake Batur to downstream irrigation
description.id: Balai Wilayah Sungai bertanggung jawab atas infrastruktur air dan alokasi dari Danau Batur ke irigasi hilir

description.en: Provincial Environmental Office monitoring Lake Batur water quality and sacred site protection
description.id: Dinas Lingkungan Hidup Provinsi memantau kualitas air Danau Batur dan perlindungan situs suci

description.en: Regency government managing Lake Batur tourism development, KJA permits, and local regulations
description.id: Pemerintah kabupaten mengelola pengembangan pariwisata Danau Batur, izin KJA, dan regulasi lokal

description.en: Traditional Balinese irrigation cooperative managing water distribution from Lake Batur through water temple system
description.id: Koperasi irigasi tradisional Bali mengelola distribusi air dari Danau Batur melalui sistem pura air

name: Pura Ulun Danu Batur Temple Council

description.en: Sacred water temple governing spiritual and practical management of Lake Batur as holy water source for all of Bali
description.id: Pura air suci yang mengatur pengelolaan spiritual dan praktis Danau Batur sebagai sumber air suci untuk seluruh Bali

description.en: Traditional Balinese village governance system managing customary law, sacred sites, and community land rights around Lake Batur
description.id: Sistem pemerintahan desa tradisional Bali mengelola hukum adat, situs suci, dan hak tanah komunal di sekitar Danau Batur

description.en: Tourism operators, hotels, and restaurants around Lake Batur generating wastewater and visitor pressure
description.id: Operator pariwisata, hotel, dan restoran di sekitar Danau Batur menghasilkan limbah dan tekanan pengunjung

description.en: Agricultural communities farming steep crater slopes, contributing runoff to Lake Batur
description.id: Komunitas pertanian yang bercocok tanam di lereng kawah curam, berkontribusi limpasan ke Danau Batur

description.en: Floating cage aquaculture operators in Lake Batur, primarily external investors, facing pushback from traditional authorities
description.id: Operator keramba jaring apung di Danau Batur, terutama investor eksternal, menghadapi penolakan dari otoritas tradisional

description.en: International oversight body for Batur UNESCO Global Geopark status, setting conservation and education standards
description.id: Badan pengawas internasional untuk status UNESCO Global Geopark Batur, menetapkan standar konservasi dan edukasi

description.en: Multi-stakeholder coordination forum attempting to bridge traditional subak system and modern government agencies
description.id: Forum koordinasi multi-pihak yang mencoba menjembatani sistem subak tradisional dan instansi pemerintah modern
